name: Let's Go to the Expo!!
description:
DESCRIPTION:
'Let's Go to the Expo!!' is an infinite & vertical runner experiment for Otaku girls developed for a class project of the University.In this game you take the role of an otaku girl who goes to the Expo and has to dodge people to move around the event. Parody and criticism in equal parts!The version shown does not represent the final quality, and a lot of things are going to change until final publication.If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to write me across any of my contact ways. With your comments, you can be part of this development.
Thank you so much for playing.INSTRUCTIONS:
  • A for Left & D for Right.
